pathParameters.name: subscriptionId
pathParameters.description: The ID of the target subscription.

pathParameters.name: resourceGroupName
pathParameters.description: The name of the resource group. The name is case insensitive.

pathParameters.name: diskPoolName
pathParameters.description: The name of the Disk Pool.

queryParameters.name: api-version
queryParameters.description: The API version to use for this operation.
